author: CJ

review: Not only did I get the Fire TV Stick, but I was charged for Prime even though when Stick was purchased, it said I got a month of Prime to try it out.  I'm very disappointed the number of movies that have to be paid for, and I'm not talking about recent movies.  I wanted to watch a Tom Selleck movie that was made in 2000, yet I would have had to pay for it.  I would suggest those interested in the item to call customer service and get a full understanding of just what you get.
